item.title: Chicken Shawarma
item.description: This is based on Nadiya Hussain’s Chicken Shawarma. It makes enough of the spice mix for two meals. Ingredients 2 tbsp cornflour 1 tbsp salt 1 tsp ground cumin 1 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp paprika 1 tsp ground turmeric ½ tsp ground cloves 1 tbsp cayenne 1 tsp ground cinnamon 2 tbsp vegetable oil 750g boneless chicken thighs, halved Method Preheat the oven to 180℃ / gas mark 4.

item.title: 10 August 2020
item.description: I’ve repotted some of the (surviving) Marigolds which I should have done weeks ago. A couple of them look like they might grow. I’ve put the compost on the cauliflowers and composted the plants.

item.title: 9 August 2020
item.description: I planted out 5 pea plants today (Hurst Green Shaft). The two closest to the house are bigger and have better root systems. They should grow to about 70cm, so I’ll need new, taller stakes. They should be ready to harvest in about 10 weeks (mid October).

item.title: Pilau Rice
item.description: Ingredients 225g basmati white rice 1 tbsp olive oil or butter 1/2 medium onion, diced 1/2 tsp salt 420ml chicken or vegetable stock, water, or a mix of water and stock Method Rinse the rice in a sieve under water until the water is barley cloudy then set aside. Melt the butter or oil in a medium saucepan and gently fry the onion until translucent and soft. Add the drained rice to the pan and mix to cover with the oil.

item.title: James' Macaroni Cheese
item.description: This is my version of Macaroni Cheese. I don’t use macaroni if I can help it because it becomes too dense. Ingredients 350g dried pasta shapes (spirelli, fusilli etc.) 1 large onion 4 rashers of bacon 50g butter 50g plain flour 750ml semi-skimmed milk 1 stock cube 1 tsp Dijon mustard 150g mature Cheddar cheese 30g Parmesan cheese Handful of breadcrumbs Method Preheat the oven to 200℃ / gas mark 6.

item.title: Green Macaroni Cheese
item.description: This is Greens mac ‘n’ cheese from Jamie Oliver. Ingredients 1 large leek 3 cloves of garlic 400g broccoli 40g unsalted butter 1/2 a bunch of fresh thyme (15g) 2 tbsp plain flour 1 litre semi-skimmed milk 450g dried macaroni 30g Parmesan cheese 150g mature Cheddar cheese 100g baby spinach 50g flaked almonds Method Preheat the oven to 180℃ / gas mark 4. Cut the broccoli into florets and set aside, trim and finely slice the stalk.

item.title: Turkish Carrot and Lentil Soup
item.description: The bulghur and lentils add some body and protein to this smokey, comforting soup. Add a cautious pinch or two of cayenne at the end; it can be potent stuff. This recipe is from a Riverford soup bag. Ingredients 1 onion 2 red peppers 400g carrots 1 garlic clove 1 bay leaf 1 tsp paprika 2 tsp cumin 40g red lentils 20g bulghur wheat 20g flaked almonds 1 lemon 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper fresh mint Method Peel and slice the onion.
